name: 蕭雨青
objective:
希望朝著技術訓練、實際運用與實驗性創作，三個層面進行課程上的交織鋪陳。在虛擬成像的關鍵技術上給予學生 3D 物件創作及影像合成的知識，並獲得自行研發與創造視覺效果的能力。
在熟悉 3d 創作工具的同時，利用軟體本身多元並高度的掌控性，重組物理世界的運行法則，利用像是重力、碰撞、光影、質感等，並企圖創造出各種感知進化的契機。
By utilizing technical training, practical application and experimental creations as three aspects for intertwining in this courses. To offer the 3D object creation and image synthesis as the key techniques of virtual imaging for students knowledge development, and access to the ability of self researching and development for creating visual effects.
While familiar this creative methods, using software itself as highly diverse controlling tools to reorganizing the rules of the physical world , such as gravity, collision, light, texture, etc., and attempting to create a variety of perceptual evolutionary opportunity.
